${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Jump.NAME: Jump
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Deal !D! to a random enemy.
NL Play *Uppercut on a random enemy.

${ModID}:GreenEcoCard.NAME: [#00ff00]Green [#00ff00]Eco
${ModID}:GreenEcoCard.DESCRIPTION: *Eco NL Supplies !M! little [#00ff00]Green [#00ff00]Eco. NL 3 Upgrades Left
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: *Eco NL Supplies !M! little [#00ff00]Green [#00ff00]Eco. NL 2 Upgrades Left
*Eco NL Supplies a big [#00ff00]Green [#00ff00]Eco. NL 1 Upgrades Left

${ModID}:Fire.NAME: Fire
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Combo NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.
Deal !D! damage to an enemy, and again to a random enemy.
Deal !D! damage and apply *Weak to !M! random enemies.
NL Play *Wastelander *Punch on targeted enemy !M! times.

${ModID}:FirePreview.NAME: Fire
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: *Scatter *Gun NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
*Wave *Concussor NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
*Blaster NL ${ModID}:Combo NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.
*Beam *Reflexor NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy, and again to a random enemy.
*Vulcan *Fury NL Deal !D! damage to 3 random enemies.
*Arc *Wielder NL Deal !D! damage and applies *Weak to 3 random enemies.
*Peace *Maker NL Deal !D! damage to an enemy.
*Super *Nova NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:WastelanderPunch.NAME: Wastelander Punch
${ModID}:WastelanderPunch.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Combo NL Yellow gun morph NL *Punch, *Fire NL Deals !D! to the shot enemy.

${ModID}:WastelanderSpin.NAME: Wastelander Spin
${ModID}:WastelanderSpin.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Combo NL Yellow gun morph NL *Jump, *Spin *Kick, *Fire NL Deals !D! to !M! random enemies.

${ModID}:BlueMorph.NAME: Vulcan Fury
${ModID}:BlueMorph.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Morph_Gun NL Supplies !M! [#0000ff]Blue ammo NL Fires a volley of shots

${ModID}:PurpleMorph.NAME: Peace Maker
${ModID}:PurpleMorph.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Morph_Gun NL Supplies !M! [#500064]Purple ammo NL Fires a high power

${ModID}:RedMorph.NAME: Scatter Gun
${ModID}:RedMorph.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Morph_Gun NL Supplies !M! [#ff0000]Red ammo NL Fires a

${ModID}:YellowMorph.NAME: Blaster
${ModID}:YellowMorph.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Morph_Gun NL Supplies !M! [#ffff00]Yellow ammo NL Fires a

${ModID}:DarkEcoBox.NAME: Dark Eco Box
${ModID}:DarkEcoBox.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Combo NL Deal !D! damage. NL Increased by !M! for each *Dark *Eco *Box in combo.

${ModID}:PlasmiteBomb.NAME: Plasmite Bomb
${ModID}:PlasmiteBomb.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Combo NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Increased by !M! for each *Plasmite *Bomb in combo.

${ModID}:EcoDraw.NAME: Eco Draw
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: specific cards NL X is half of the [#0000ff]Blue [#0000ff]Eco you have.

${ModID}:EcoSpeed.NAME: Speed of Eco
${ModID}:EcoSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card for each [#0000ff]Blue [#0000ff]Eco you have.

${ModID}:EcoStrength.NAME: Strength of Eco
${ModID}:EcoStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain X temporary *Strength where X is the amount of [#ff0000]Red [#ff0000]Eco you have.

${ModID}:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
${ModID}:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL [#ffff00]Yellow [#ffff00]Eco affects this card 3 times.

${ModID}:PrecursorGunCard.NAME: Precursor Gun
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: [E] to play. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! extra damage per [E] above
